author: Bill Berger
text: Pinellas County (FL) has formed a team to examine and provide recommendations for an efficient, effective model for the delivery of budget and financial management services to the organization and the public. We are seeking information from peers regarding the models they are using and the pros and cons of those models. Major functions considered to be within the scope of this model include, but are not limited to: budgeting; performance management; forecasting; Capital Improvement Plan; grants administration; debt management; rates; user fees; billing; collections.
title: Budget and Financial Management Services Delivery Model
